content.text: Good, thanks for asking! What are your hobbies?
I like to build things, mostly things for my house. I built a new deck for my birthday last year.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to spend time on my farm, tending to my animals and crops.
That must be really rewarding. I wish I had a green thumb.
It can be, but it's also a lot of work!
I'm sure it is. What kind of animals do you have on your farm?
I have chickens, cows, pigs, and a few goats.
Wow, that's a lot of animals! I've always wanted to have a farm.
It's a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you enjoy it.
Thanks! What are some of your favorite bands?
I like VV Nation a lot. They're a good rock band.
I've never heard of them. I'll have to check them out.
Okay, I will. Thanks for the recommendation!
